Title: Ola S1 Pro to Get "Greener" Variant this Independence Day, hints CEO Bhavish Aggarwal
Description: Ola Electric will be unveiling their "greenest EV" on Independence Day, tweets CEO Bhavish Aggarwal

Title: BEST Launches New Ho-Ho AC Bus Service in Mumbai
Description: The new Ho-Ho AC bus service in Mumbai has been started to commemorate the 75th anniversary of BEST

Title: Jyotiraditya Scindia says Over 1.5 Lakh Flights Kicked off Under UDAN Scheme
Description: Jyotiraditya Scindia said that in the last 5 years over 1.50 lakh flights were kicked off under UDAN scheme

Title: Raksha Bandhan 2022: Indian Railways to Run 6 Special Trains, Check Full List Here
Description: Indian Railways Update: These special trains will run between, Gujarat, Maharashtra, Delhi, Madhya Pradesh and Rajasthan
